name: The Arcslinger
description: When the world is in danger, the people turn to a hero. Entrusted with the mythical gun Angelheart, you must take down the villainous Gold Smoke and his dastardly gang. Do you have what it takes to become The Arcslinger?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 980 GTX or higher Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires Oculus Rift or HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7or newer Processor: i7-5930K or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 980 GTX or higher Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires Oculus Rift or HTC Vive
